title: Watch Wednesday's Representing Border online
text:
Play video David Cameron's land grab for the centre ground of British politics. The Prime Minister tells his party conference he wants to build a Greater Britain that leaves no-one behind. And Ruth Davidson, his Scottish leader, is convinced the Tories are on their way back north of the border.
Last updated Wed 7 Oct 2015 Read more 243 updates Watch Representing Border Politics Scotland Dumfries and Galloway Scottish Borders South of Scotland Representing Border Holyrood
